text:
Even if your local outbreak starts at a meat processing plant,  it won't stay there.

When it gets into your local nursing homes and longterm care facilities, it will kill swiftly there, and in terrible numbers.

13 dead at nursing home in Sioux Falls, SD:
https://t.co/oly05vQFdi
